l:dependency.name: Handy URI Templates
l:dependency.l:description: Handy URI Templates is a RFC6570 compliant URI template processor. The library allows clients to utilize templatized URIs and inject replacement variables to expand the template into a URI. The library sports a fluent API, ability to plugin custom object renderers, and supports all levels of URI templates.

l:dependency.name: Joda-Time
l:dependency.l:description: Date and time library to replace JDK date handling
